data.title: Orlando WKMG TV interview
data.meta_description: WKMG TV - Home burglary in Orlando / College Park and how CCTV security video cameras can provide an effective solution. SECURITY PRO of FL at (386) 218-4977.
data.text:
This special video report (below) about home security cameras and recent neighborhood burglaries in the College Park Florida area aired during the Orlando television station WKMG TV channel 6 evening news on April 24, 2012. The story featured a College Park resident who was having a CCTV security camera system installed by Security Pro of Florida. Chad Casassa, Vice President of Security Pro of Florida is briefly interviewed during the segment. He explains that Security Pro’s security camera system is activated by a motion detection sensor and is always on guard.

Security Pro of Florida, LLC specializes in CCTV security camera video systems. Security Pro of Florida provides Central Florida clients with security and fire alarm systems, CCTV security camera systems, 24 hour UL-listed central station monitoring and fast, professional on-site service. If you have any questions about security or video camera systems, call (386) 218-4977. You can also visit Security Pro’s website at Security Pro of Florida CCTV security cameras.
